description:

description:
We recently reported about a man randomly punching unsuspecting women in NYC. The man the NYPD believes is responsible for this has been arrested several times in the past six months. Common sense should tell anyone with a fraction of a brain that if this man was held accountable for his crimes, then he would have been in jail and none of this would have happened. But we all know common sense is not common among those on the Left.

When you have an entire movement based on anything but making sense, mixed in with the majority being painfully naive, combined with the fact that all that is fueled through disdain for anyone who dares disagree with them, you get this story.

The Salon has a reprehensible take on the brazen NYC attacks. Rather than hold the psycho responsible fo
title: Leftist News Outlet Blames ‚ÄúMale Rage‚Äù And ‚ÄúMAGA Misogyny‚Äù On Those Random Girls Getting Punched In NYC

A furry frenzy erupted when 100 huskies were accidentally let loose in a Chinese mall after someone forgot to keep the gate locked at a pet cafe.

It is unclear why the pet cafe had 100 pups and it's equally unfathomable as to how they fit all of them in the establishment, especially considering these are large dogs. But I digress.

‚Äî (@)
title: Watch: Chaos Erupts After 100 Huskies Escape In Chinese Mall Because Someone Forgot To Close The Gate

description:
In the Progressive pursuit of equity, you cannot have gifted and talented students. Progressive ideology never breeds excellence. Because when you have kids who are under par, everyone must be equally substandard, at best. The strongest proponents for this are almost always composed of unexceptional merit. And when you break people down into racial identity groups on top of all that, you get this story.

Seattle decided to close its Highly Capable Cohort (HHC) schools for gifted students by the start of the 2027 school year because it had too many students who were white and Asian. And since Progressives are mentally incompetent, they don‚Äôt have the capability of lifting more students who can excel in the program and the best they can do is treat every kid as if they are run-of-the-mill.

title: In The Pursuit Of Educational Equity, Seattle Slashes Gifted Students Program Because Too Many White Students Are Enrolled
